markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Deepwater Dhuthorex](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1382)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

The typical dhuthorex is a dumb and hungry beast, chasing prey through the depths and venturing onto land only to pursue easy prey.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Aberration](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11)): DC 28

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 26

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 23
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 9">[Deepwater Dhuthorex](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1382)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="CN" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Aberration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=1" />
<trait label="Aquatic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=168" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #165: Eyes of Empty Death](/Sources.aspx?ID=81) pg. 80</row>

**Perception** +18; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [wavesense (imprecise) 60 feet](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=41)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +20, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +18, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +19

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +7

**Dex** +3

**Con** +4

**Int** -4

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +0
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 28 [all-around vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=1)

**Fort** +19 

**Ref** +18 

**Will** +17 

</row>

**HP** 155

**Immunities**
acid

[**Attack of Opportunity**](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3) <actions string="Reaction" />

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 10 feet; swim 40 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +21 ([deadly d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d10+11 piercing plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18)

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
snout +21 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d8+11 bludgeoning plus [Push](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=25)

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
tentacle +19 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d6+11 slashing

**[Aquatic Ambush](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=2)** <actions string="Single Action" />  

**Overpowering Jaws**   A deepwater dhuthorex deals 7 piercing damage to its target if its jaws Strike is a failure (but not a critical failure).

**[Swallow Whole](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=35)** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Attack](/Traits.aspx?ID=15)) Medium, 2d6+7 bludgeoning plus 2d6 acid, Rupture 20

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-283" />
name: Deepwater Dhuthorex
